title: PersonaBot
description: An iOS app that lets users create and customize intelligent bots with unique knowledge bases and behaviors. It combines a Swift frontend with a Python backend using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) via OpenAI's ChatGPT and LlamaIndex for fully personalized bot experiences.
